    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pylab as plt
import datetime as dt
import warnings
warnings.simplefilter(action="ignore", category=FutureWarning)
source.4be5047a:
df['date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['date'])
df["Month_Number"] = df["date"].dt.month
df["Week_Day"] = df["date"].dt.dayofweek
df['weekday_name'] = df[['date']].apply(lambda x: dt.datetime.strftime(x['date'], '%A'), axis=1)
df['year'] = df["date"].dt.year
df['day'] = df["date"].dt.day
df['dayofyear'] = df["date"].dt.dayofyear
print(df.info())
source.331a464b:
ff2 = df[(df['date'] >= '2015-01-01') & (df['date'] <= '2018-12-31')]
ff2=ff2.groupby('day').sum()
counts = ff2.groupby('day').sum().reset_index()
sns.lineplot(counts['day'],counts['num_sold'])
plt.show()
source.f119bb26: # **Line Plot by day of year of products sales in two different stores in three countries**
source.925c0dec: ## **Most sales during start and end of the month**
